summary: An internal FBI email chain from October 8, 2019, providing an update on the Jeffrey Epstein investigation. It details the status of seized digital evidence, scheduled attorney proffers for co-conspirators, victim identification, and hotline activity.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the investigation; digital devices were seized from his Manhattan residence, Little St. James property, and from his person at the time of arrest.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Identified as a co-conspirator; her attorney proffer was scheduled for October 8, 2019.

connections.description: Maxwell is explicitly listed as a co-conspirator in the investigation alongside Epstein.

events.title: Attorney Proffer for Co-conspirator
events.description: An attorney proffer session was conducted for an unnamed co-conspirator.

events.title: Attorney Proffer for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: An attorney proffer session was scheduled for co-conspirator Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Scheduled Proffer for Co-conspirator
events.description: A proffer session was scheduled for an unnamed co-conspirator.

events.title: Victim Briefing in Miami
events.description: A victim briefing was scheduled to take place in Miami.

events.title: Scheduled Attorney Proffer for Co-conspirator
events.description: An attorney proffer session was scheduled for an unnamed co-conspirator.

events.title: Victim Briefing in NYC
events.description: A victim briefing was scheduled to take place in New York City.

keyFacts: Approximately 78 digital devices were seized in total from Epstein's Manhattan residence, Little St. James, and from his person at arrest.
Ghislaine Maxwell is explicitly identified as a co-conspirator, with her attorney proffer scheduled for October 8, 2019.
Approximately 80 victims have been identified, with potentially dozens more unidentified; victim briefings were scheduled in Miami and NYC.
A hotline had received 194 calls, with 26 related to possible victims and 10 to possible co-conspirators.
The review of digital evidence from Epstein's Manhattan residence and person was limited due to an ongoing taint team review.
